#
# This file contains a list of external dependencies
# needed to run stoqdrivers, they are processed by pip/easy_install
#

# FIXME: Reenable this once kiwi is released in pypi, otherwise
# we wont be able to pip install inside jenkins
#kiwi-gtk >= 3.0
zope.interface >= 3.0
pyserial >= 2.2
pyusb
qrcode >= 4.0.1
